div.sent: Embroidery is an important craft.
To sew any design is a work as drawing a picture.
Mother sews many things for you, such as: Frocks, Scarf, Bed-sheet, Table-cloth, various clothing's etc.
Besides these, various kinds of embroidered quilt, pictures can be seen everywhere now a days.
One of the main folk art is quilt, fans and various pictures done by the village girls.
The girls of cities are sewing these now a days.
Demand of embroidered quilt, embroidered picture etc. has increased very much now a days.
Bangladesh earns a lot of foreign currency by exporting these crafts.
This art has been introduced by our country to the world.
Meanwhile you have learnt of few stitches of embroidery in the previous class, which has been repeated here to remind you.
A few new stitches are given here too.
We hope, you will be able to design many creative works and will be able to make yourself self reliant.

Dresses made by knitting is an other process of weaving.
Such as-singlets socks, sweater/cardigan etc. can be made by machine as well as with knitting needles or crochet hooks by hand.
It has been discussed briefly here how to do knitting with knitting needles.
You have learnt about casting loops, purl and knit loops.
A few of them are repeated here to remind you again.
The method of casting on loops/ stitches.
Casting stitches on a Knitting needle is the first step in knitting.
There are several ways to do this.
The stitches/loops can be cast with one needle or two needles.
This method is needed for which dress's border should be tight.
Such as borders of coats, caps etc.
This method uses one needle and two ends of yarn.
The length will depend on the number of stitches/loops to be cast on (look at the picture).
Pass the needle through the loop.
Gently pull the ends of the yarn to tighten the loop.
Arrange the yarn so the shorter end is on the left-ball end, on the right (look at the picture).
Hold the needle in the right hand as you would hold a pencil.
Put the yarn over the first (picture) finger under the middle and over the middle joint of the ring finger.
The first finger moves the yarn around the needle, while the middle and ring fingers regulate the flow of the yarn.
Pick up the free end of the yarn with the left hand(look at the picture).
Hold it lightly against the palm with the middle ring and little fingers.
Wrap the yarn around the thumb, forming a loop close to the needle (picture).
Insert the needle into the loop.
Pass the yarn in the right hand under the point of the needle and over it (picture).
Draw the needle and yarn through the loop and slip the loops from the thumb, leaving a stitch on the needle (picture).
Tighten the loop, or stitch by pulling the free end of the yarn with the left hand (picture).
Repeat the procedure until the required number of stitches have been made.
There are many procedures for knitting.
It is necessary to learn these procedures such as-knitting with two needles, knitting round, purl and knit etc.
This method of casting on loops is referred to as knitting on stitches.
It is worked with two needles and one end of yarn.
To begin the process, make a slip-knot at the end of the yarn.
Put the needle held in the left hand into the loop.
Then insert the needle in the right hand into the loop under the left-hand ; needle.
Put the yarn under and over the right-hand needle (Look at the picture).
Draw the yarn through the loop, being careful not to pull the stitch off the needle.
It should remain on the left-hand needle (picture).
Transfer the new loop from the right-hand needle to the left-hand one (picture).
Continue this procedure until the required number of stitches have been cast on (Look at. the Picture).
Knitting stitches with long needles is comfortable.
To Knit, put the needle with the cast on stitches in the left hand the empty one and the yarn in the right hand.
Place the point of the needle into the front of the stitch.
Bring the yarn under and over the top of the right hand needle.
Draw the yarn through the stitch, making a new stitch on the right-hand needle.
Slip the old stitch from the left-hand needle.
Continue to make all knit stitches this way (Look at the, picture).

To increase the purling, purl first into the front of the stitch in the regular way but do not remove the stitch from the needle.
Instead, Taking Stitch and building double stitches Knitting with two needles make the extra stitch by purling into the back of the same stitch.
Then slip the old stitch off the left-hand needle, leaving two stitches on the right-hand needle instead of one (Look at the pictures).
To shape a knitted piece, the number of stitches can be reduced.
This can be done in various ways.
There are two common methods.
But here only one, method is mentioned.
The other one you will know later.
Two stitches are knitted together for reducing stitches.
It is done on a knitted row.
To decrease in knitting place the right- hand needle through the front of, the second stitch and then through the first.
This method can be used for knitting more.

In the middle of the cap put a pompon.
A pompon looks like a Kadam (a variety of flower), Socks, Caps orCardigans can be decorated withpompons.
Take half of a post card in length or a piece of board paperin double in length according howbig a pompon you want to make.
Then wind wool over the card.
Now take a piece of double wool andinsert it into the wound wool.
Two ends of the both sides should be kept.
Now take off, the wound woolfrom the paper and bind by the tow ends of wool tight.
You should out the ends of the double wool long to sew it on the top of the cap.
Then cut a little bit to make the shape of the pompon (Look at the picture).
Cast on stitches as required, or if you like to make 15 centimeter bag, then cast on 42 stitches.
Now knit or purl all rows or knit one ribbed pattern untill 34 centimeter length bind off stitches.
Now fold it in the middle (lengthwise) and sew tow sides together, it seems like a bag.
Then one side (opened side) cast on 8 stitches (4 from each side).
Knit these four stitches until it comes 30 centimeter in length.
From the other side of the bag cast on 8 stitches too and with that 30 centimeter ribbon join and bind off the stitches together.
